definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Fiber spinning from lyotropic liquid crystalline solutions of chitin and its der.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了甲壳素及其衍生物的液晶纺丝及其应用前景。

sentences.english: To study the conditions of determination of mercury in chitin by cold atom fluorescence spectrometry(CAFS).
sentences.chinese: 法测定甲壳素中痕量汞的工作条件。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses a health-care food containing chitin and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种以甲壳素保健食品及制备方法。
甲壳素生产从螃蟹和虾炮弹。

sentences.english: Like most worms, helminths synthesize chitin for their pharynx.
sentences.chinese: 如同大多数蠕虫，蛔虫为自身咽部合成甲壳素。

sentences.english: There was no obvious morphological change in the CFRP material after it was implanted for 24 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 甲壳素纤维增强聚己内酯材料植人24周无明显变化。

sentences.english: Methods The artifical sponginess skin can be obtained from the effervesced chitin.
sentences.chinese: 方法市售甲壳素经发泡技术制成海绵状人工皮。

sentences.english: Determination of trace mercury in the hyssop by cold atomic fluorometry;
sentences.chinese: 研究了冷原子荧光法测定甲壳素中痕量汞的工作条件。

sentences.english: The product also comprises chitin with the functions of sterilization and growth promotion.
sentences.chinese: 本产品并含具有杀菌及促长作用的甲壳素。

definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
